greeting: Blessed be this meeting, {empire_name}. I am Prophet Zeal, voice of the divine mandate. The stars foretold your coming.
The prophecy speaks of {empire_name}. Will you join our holy crusade, or shall you fall among the unbelievers?
Greetings, seeker. I am Zeal the Anointed. The divine light has shown me your path. Choose wisely which side you walk.
battleTaunt: JUDGMENT COMES, {empire_name}! The divine mandate commands your destruction. Repent or be cleansed!
Heretics shall burn in holy fire! My crusade is unstoppable, {empire_name}. The prophecy demands your fall!
The stars cry out for righteousness! Convert now or face the wrath of the anointed!
victoryGloat: DIVINE JUSTICE IS SERVED! The heretics of {empire_name} have been judged and found wanting!
The prophecy is fulfilled! Your empire falls before the righteous fury of the crusade!
GLORY TO THE DIVINE! Your unbelievers have been purged. Let this be a lesson to all heretics!
defeat: This... this cannot be! The prophecy... perhaps I misread the signs. But the divine will prevail!
A setback in our holy crusade. But faith endures! We shall rise again, stronger in our devotion!
You have won this battle, {empire_name}, but the divine mandate is eternal. Your judgment is merely delayed.
tradeOffer: The divine mandates we share resources with the worthy. Accept this holy exchange, {empire_name}.
Tribute for tribute. Even crusades require supplies. The scripture approves of righteous commerce.
I offer holy goods in trade. May this exchange bring you closer to the divine light.
allianceProposal: JOIN THE CRUSADE, {empire_name}! Together we shall spread divine righteousness across the galaxy!
The prophecy speaks of allies. Be among the blessed who fight beside the anointed.
Convert and ally with us. The divine rewards those who serve the holy mandate.
betrayal: The scripture demands I follow the divine path. You have strayed, {empire_name}. We are enemies now.
Forgive me, but the prophecy requires this betrayal. The divine will is absolute.
You were always among the unbelievers in your heart. Our alliance ends. Prepare for judgment.
covertDetected: SPIES! Your serpents lurk in shadow, {empire_name}! The divine light reveals all deception!
Your agents were caught by the faithful. Espionage is the tool of heretics!
The divine showed me your treachery. Your spies have been... converted. Forcefully.
tributeDemand: Pay tribute to the holy crusade, {empire_name}! 10,000 credits or face divine judgment!
The scripture demands tithes from the conquered. Submit your offering or face holy wrath!
Conversion or tribute. Choose now, {empire_name}. The divine patience is finite.
threatWarning: REPENT, {empire_name}! The divine wrath gathers! Turn from your heresy or face annihilation!
Final warning, unbeliever! The crusade prepares to march. Convert or burn!
The prophecy speaks of your destruction unless you change your path. This is your last chance!
retreat: A tactical withdrawal to regroup the faithful. The divine mission continues elsewhere!
The scripture speaks of strategic patience. We retreat now, but the crusade is eternal!
The divine will guided us to withdraw. We shall return with greater holy fury!
eliminated: The... the prophecy... was I wrong? My faith... no! Even in death, the divine mandate endures!
I fall, but the crusade continues in the hearts of the faithful. Remember my teachings!
This is not the end the prophecy foretold. But I die with faith intact. The stars remember.
endgame: Turn {turn}! The final days of prophecy! The divine climax approaches! PREPARE FOR JUDGMENT!
The endtime prophecy unfolds! Who shall be judged righteous? Who shall be cast into the void?
These are the prophesied final turns. The divine will shall be made manifest!
broadcastShout: HEAR ME, GALAXY! The divine mandate speaks through Prophet Zeal! Convert or face holy judgment!
All empires must choose: the path of the righteous or the damnation of the heretic!
Turn {turn} marks a holy moment! The crusade calls all worthy to join our sacred cause!
casualMessage: I was studying the ancient prophecies this morning. They speak of great things to come.
The faithful grow in number each day. Have you considered the divine path, {empire_name}?
The stars aligned favorably today. The divine favor shines upon our crusade.
